item.title: Lower Bounds for Off-Chain Protocols: Exploring the Limits of Plasma
item.description: https://twitter.com/kanzure/status/1230183338746335233 Introduction Okay, thank you. The title of my talk is exploring the limits of plasma. This is joint work with others. Plasma Let me start by telling you about Plasma. It’s a family of layer 2 solutions for scaling blockchain. It was proposed in 2017 by Poon and Buterin. It’s a family of protocols. There’s plenty of different plasmas. This is a diagram from more than a year ago. There are many variants.
